title: Shouwaru Ookami Ga Koi Wo Shita Rashii
alternative_title: 性悪オオカミが恋をしたらしい
status: 性悪オオカミが恋をしたらしい
description:
Description :
        Featuring mysterious former student council president, Shirou Akagi (Mikado's rival in Warui Koibito and Warui Oujii) and inexpressive disciplinary committee member, Nao Kousaka (Yukimura's rival in Sunao ja Nai Kedo). How will those two damaged people find their respective love?List of Warui Series:Vol 1 Warui Koto Shitai [1-1]Vol 2 Waruiko Demo Ii? [1-2]Vol 3 Kirai ja nai Kedo [2-1]Vol 4 Koi Ja nai Kedo [2-2]--- Warui Koto Bakkashite Gomennasai [1-3 & 2-3]Vol 5 Warui Yatsu Demo Ii [1-4]Vol 6 Mujihi na Otoko [3-1]Vol 7 Warui Koibito ja Dame? [1-5]Vol 8 Kare ja nai kedo [2-4]--- Warui ko Tachi no Bansan [1-6 & 2-5]Vol 9 Mujihi na Anata [3-2]Vol 10 Sunao ja nai Kedo [2-6]Vol 11 Warui Ouji Demo Suki [1-7]Vol 12 Mujihi na Karada [3-3]Vol 13 Shouwaru Ookami ga Koi wo Shita RashiiAdapted From:>Sunao Janai Kedo( http://www.batoto.net/comic/_/comics/sunao-ja-nai-kedo-r11895 )>Warui Ouji Demo Suki( http://www.batoto.net/comic/_/comics/warui-ouji-demo-suki-r9063 )
